Song.title: I Will Sing Of My Redeemer
Song.copyright: Â© 2005 New Spring | Row J, Seat 9 Songs | Upper Cates Music | Curb Songs | Todd Smith Publishing (Admin. by Brentwood-Benson Music Publishing, Inc.)

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G | G | C | C | G | G | C | C |]
Verse 1: [G]I will sing of [C]my Redeemer [G]He Who took the [D]nails for me [G]I've been purchased [C]I've been pardoned [G]Bound to Him I'm [D]truly [G]free
Verse 2: [G]I will sing of [C]my Redeemer [G]How He sought me [D]while a slave [G]Loosed me from the [C]curse of sin [G]And from the power [D]of the [G]grave
Chorus: [G]I will sing of [C]my Redeemer [Em7]Lift my voice to [C]praise my [D]Lord [G]Ransomed by His [C]blood and mercy [Am7]I am His for[C]e[D]verm[G]ore
Verse 3: [G]I will sing of [C]my Redeemer [G]He Who bore my c[D]ross my curse [G]Came a servant c[C]hose to suffer [G]Lifted up and [D]cast from [G]earth
Verse 4: [G]I will sing of [C]my Redeemer [G]Tell about the [D]grace I've known [G]Here on earth with [C]those forgiven [G]And one day ar[D]ound His [G]throne
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i will sing of my redeemer he who took the nails for me ive been purchased ive been pardoned bound to him im truly free verse 2 i will sing of my redeemer how he sought me while a slave loosed me from the curse of sin and from the power of the grave chorus i will sing of my redeemer lift my voice to praise my lord ransomed by his blood and mercy i am his forevermore verse 3 i will sing of my redeemer he who bore my cross my curse came a servant chose to suffer lifted up and cast from earth verse 4 i will sing of my redeemer tell about the grace ive known here on earth with those forgiven and one day around his throne
